doc:
Augie Blunt https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Augie_Blunt 0 Augie Blunt (August 17, 1929 – May 2, 1999) was an American film and television actor. Blunt was born Augustine Durell Blunt in Monroe, Michigan, located south of Detroit, Michigan; his parents were William Blunt and Essie C. Wilson-Blunt. He and his parents lived Monroe. After the military Augie moved to Los Angeles, California where he was a musician and a teacher for LAUSD before deciding to become an actor, and so he did by appearing in films and television shows. His son Erin Blunt was too a child actor in Car Wash and Bad News Bears. Blunt married Dolores Scott on February 2, 1962, in Las Vegas, Nevada, together they had 3 children, (1 son, 2 daughters), Jean Adele Scott- Blunt (b. 1958), Carla Nicole Scott- Blunt (b. 1960), Erin Durell Blunt (b. 1963) Augie died on May 2, 1999, in Los Angeles, California, he was 69 years old at the time of his death, and was interred at Riverside National Cemetery. Augie_Blunt ( August_17_,_1929 – May_2_,_1999 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . Blunt was_born Augustine_Durell_Blunt in Monroe , Michigan , located south of Detroit , Michigan ; his_parents were William_Blunt and Essie_C._Wilson-Blunt . He and his_parents lived Monroe . After the_military_Augie moved to Los_Angeles , California where he was a_musician and a_teacher for LAUSD before deciding_to_become an_actor , and so he did by appearing in films_and_television_shows . His_son_Erin_Blunt was too_a_child_actor in Car_Wash and Bad_News_Bears . Blunt married Dolores_Scott on February_2_,_1962 , in Las_Vegas , Nevada , together they had 3_children , (_1_son , 2_daughters_) , Jean_Adele_Scott - Blunt (_b._1958_) , Carla_Nicole_Scott - Blunt (_b._1960_) , Erin_Durell_Blunt_(_b._1963 ) Augie died on May_2_,_1999 , in Los_Angeles , California , he was 69_years old at the_time of his_death , and was_interred at Riverside_National_Cemetery .
